ns0:target.ns0:g: यदि फार्मासिस्ट के पास यह प्रशिक्षण है, तो उसकी गोपनीयता और गोपनीयता सुनिश्चित करना याद रखें। फार्मासिस्ट को उसे आगे के समर्थन के लिए एक विशेषज्ञ सेवा का उल्लेख करना चाहिए।

ns0:source.ns0:g: The pharmacist addressed Mathilde's concern about difficulty in her relationship and referred her to a specialist service for support.

ns0:source.ns0:g: It can be difficult to ask about IPV but if there is a doubt, always ask.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="42" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="ListNumberedAsArabic" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: When a client shares experience of IPV, the pharmacist must always refer them to a specialist service for support.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: फार्मासिस्ट ने अपने रिश्ते में कठिनाई के बारे में मैथिल्ड की चिंता को संबोधित किया और उसे समर्थन के लिए एक विशेषज्ञ सेवा के लिए भेजा।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="42" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="ListNumberedAsArabic" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: आईपीवी के बारे में पूछना मुश्किल हो सकता है लेकिन अगर कोई संदेह है, तो हमेशा पूछें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="42" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="ListNumberedAsArabic" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: जब कोई ग्राहक आईपीवी का अनुभव साझा करता है, तो फार्मासिस्ट को हमेशा उन्हें समर्थन के लिए एक विशेषज्ञ सेवा के लिए संदर्भित करना होगा।

ns0:source.ns0:g: The pharmacist addressed Mathilde's concern about difficulty in her relationship and referred her to a specialist service for support.

ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: It can be difficult to ask about Intimate Partner Violence (IPV) but if there is a doubt, always ask.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="42" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="ListNumberedAsArabic" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: When a client shares experience of IPV, the pharmacist must always refer them to a specialist service for support.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: फार्मासिस्ट ने अपने रिश्ते में कठिनाई के बारे में मैथिल्ड की चिंता को संबोधित किया और उसे समर्थन के लिए एक विशेषज्ञ सेवा के लिए भेजा।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="42" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="ListNumberedAsArabic" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: अंतरंग साथी हिंसा (आईपीवी) के बारे में पूछना मुश्किल हो सकता है, लेकिन अगर कोई संदेह है, तो हमेशा पूछें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="42" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="ListNumberedAsArabic" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: जब कोई ग्राहक आईपीवी का अनुभव साझा करता है, तो फार्मासिस्ट को हमेशा उन्हें समर्थन के लिए एक विशेषज्ञ सेवा के लिए संदर्भित करना होगा।

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:source.ns0:g: Before you go, I would like to share some information that I offer all my clients​,

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:g: यह जानकारी आपके लिए विशिष्ट नहीं है, लेकिन अगर आपको समर्थन की आवश्यकता है, तो मैं आपकी मदद कर सकता हूं।

ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" LinkColor="dk1,00" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: this information is not specific to you, but if you need support, I can help you​.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" LinkColor="dk1,00" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: जाने से पहले, मैं कुछ जानकारी साझा करना चाहूंगा जो मैं अपने सभी ग्राहकों की पेशकश करता हूं,
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" LinkColor="dk1,00" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: यह जानकारी आपके लिए विशिष्ट नहीं है, लेकिन अगर आपको समर्थन की आवश्यकता है, तो मैं आपकी मदद कर सकता हूं।

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" LinkColor="dk1,00" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Many people experience problems with their partner or someone else
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" LinkColor="dk1,00" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: they live with​, such problems can be very harmful to the health of women​.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>

ns0:source.ns0:g: To help Mathilde feel comfortable, listen to Mathilde's concerns and put her at the centre of the conversation. This will make her feel comfortable and encourage her to speak openly. Let her know that the pharmacists will provide assistance in seeking support. Remember, IPV is not normal and must be handled with sensitivity and care.

ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="#000000" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="#000000"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Remember, intimate partner violence is not normal. You must handle it with sensitivity and care.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Start="0" Color="#000000,00" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="#000000" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="#000000"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: मैथिल्डे को सहज महसूस करने में मदद करने के लिए, मैथिल्डे की चिंताओं को सुनें और उसे बातचीत के केंद्र में डाल दें। यह उसे सहज महसूस कराएगा और उसे खुलकर बोलने के लिए प्रोत्साहित करेगा। उसे बताएं कि फार्मासिस्ट सहायता मांगने में सहायता प्रदान करेंगे। याद रखें, IPV सामान्य नहीं है और संवेदनशीलता और देखभाल के साथ संभाला जाना चाहिए।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Start="0" Color="#000000,00" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="#000000" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="#000000"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="4"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Start="0" Color="#000000,00" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="#000000" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="#000000"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: याद रखें, अंतरंग साथी हिंसा सामान्य नहीं है। आपको इसे संवेदनशीलता और देखभाल के साथ संभालना होगा।

ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="#000000" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="#000000"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: याद रखें, अंतरंग साथी हिंसा सामान्य नहीं है। आपको इसे संवेदनशीलता और देखभाल के साथ संभालना होगा।

ns0:target.ns0:g: जारी रखने के लिए सही पर क्लिक करें/स्वाइप करें।

ns0:source.ns0:g: To help Mathilde feel comfortable, listen to Mathilde's concerns and put her at the centre of the conversation. This will make her feel comfortable and encourage her to speak openly. Let her know that the pharmacists will provide assistance in seeking support. Remember, IPV is not normal and must be handled with sensitivity and care.

ns0:source.ns0:g: Remember, intimate partner violence is not normal. You must handle it with sensitivity and care.

ns0:source.ns0:g: Neetu says: I’m scared to say but my boyfriend and I had an argument. We got into a fight.

ns0:target.ns0:g: नीतू कहते हैं: मैं यह कहने से डरता हूं कि मेरे प्रेमी और मेरे पास एक तर्क था। हम एक लड़ाई में आ गए।

ns0:target.ns0:g: फार्मासिस्ट को कैसे जवाब देना चाहिए?
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:g: सही विकल्प चुनें और सबमिट करें।

ns0:source.ns0:g: We can spend some time to discuss this if you would like, and I can offer some support.

ns0:source.ns0:g: Many women experience problems with their partner or someone
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>

ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="#000000" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="#000000"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: The pharmacist should give Neetu the option to discuss her argument with her boyfriend further. Actively listening to Neetu’s concerns is very important. It is the basis of first-line support.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="4"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="#000000" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="#000000"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="4"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Start="0" Color="#000000,00" Size="100" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="#000000" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="#000000"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: The pharmacist should not minimise intimate partner violence or tell Neetu what to do.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="4"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="#000000" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="#000000"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: फार्मासिस्ट को नीतू को अपने प्रेमी के साथ अपने तर्क पर चर्चा करने का विकल्प देना चाहिए। नीतू की चिंताओं को सक्रिय रूप से सुनना बहुत महत्वपूर्ण है। यह पहली पंक्ति के समर्थन का आधार है।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="4"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="4"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Start="0" Color="#000000,00" Size="100" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="#000000" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="#000000"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: फार्मासिस्ट को अंतरंग साथी हिंसा को कम नहीं करना चाहिए या नीतू को बताना चाहिए कि क्या करना है।

ns0:source.ns0:g: The pharmacist should give Neetu the option to discuss her argument with her boyfriend further. Actively listening to Neetu’s concerns is very important. It is the basis of first-line support.

ns0:source.ns0:g: The pharmacist should not minimise intimate partner violence or tell Neetu what to do.

ns0:target.ns0:g: फार्मासिस्ट को नीतू को अपने प्रेमी के साथ अपने तर्क पर चर्चा करने का विकल्प देना चाहिए। नीतू की चिंताओं को सक्रिय रूप से सुनना बहुत महत्वपूर्ण है। यह पहली पंक्ति के समर्थन का आधार है।

ns0:source.ns0:g: It can be difficult to ask about Intimate Partner Violence (IPV) but if there is a doubt, always ask.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="42" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="ListNumberedAsArabic" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:source.ns0:g: When a client shares experience of IPV, the pharmacist must always refer them to a specialist service for support.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: फार्मासिस्ट ने अपने रिश्ते में कठिनाई के बारे में नीतू की चिंता को संबोधित किया और उसे समर्थन के लिए एक विशेषज्ञ सेवा के लिए भेजा।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: अंतरंग साथी हिंसा (आईपीवी) के बारे में पूछना मुश्किल हो सकता है, लेकिन अगर कोई संदेह है, तो हमेशा पूछें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="42" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="ListNumberedAsArabic" ListTypeFormat="Period" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Roboto Light" FontSize="14" FontIsBold="False" FontIsItalic="False" FontIsUnderline="False" FontIsStrikeout="False" UnderlineStyle="Normal" ForegroundColor="dk1,00" BackgroundColor="#000000,00" UnderlineColor="#000000,00" Elevation="Normal" Spacing="0" IgnoreKerningTable="False" DisplayCase="AsIs" LanguageId="0" LinkColor="dk1,00"> <Shadow Offset="0x0" Color="#FFFFFF,00" /> </Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: जब कोई ग्राहक आईपीवी का अनुभव साझा करता है, तो फार्मासिस्ट को हमेशा उन्हें समर्थन के लिए एक विशेषज्ञ सेवा के लिए संदर्भित करना होगा।

ns0:target.ns0:g: इस मॉड्यूल के अंत तक आप करेंगे:

ns0:source.ns0:g: recognise the importance of asking all clients about the risks of sexually transmitted infections and intimate partner violence;
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="42" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="64" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Start="0" Color="#000000" Size="100" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Segoe UI"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:g: प्रतिबिंबित करें कि स्वयं की सेटिंग में यौन संचारित संक्रमण या अंतरंग साथी हिंसा के जोखिम पर ग्राहकों को कहां संदर्भित करें।

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Here are some useful links and documents:

ns0:target.ns0:text: यहाँ कुछ उपयोगी लिंक और दस्तावेज हैं:

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Indicators for an Eating Disorder Assessment

ns0:target.ns0:text: खाने की विकार मूल्यांकन के लिए संकेतक

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Who to Screen for an Eating Disorder

ns0:target.ns0:text: खाने के विकार के लिए कौन स्क्रीन करें

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Signs and Symptoms of Semi Starvation

ns0:target.ns0:text: अर्ध भुखमरी के लक्षण और लक्षण

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: 4.1 Take a moment to reflect on what you have learned: How to ask clients about STIs and IPV How and where to refer clients for specialist services for STI or IPV in your area Think about how you can apply what you have learned into your practice and submit.

ns0:target.ns0:text: 4.1 आपने जो कुछ भी सीखा है, उसे प्रतिबिंबित करने के लिए एक क्षण लें: एसटीआई और आईपीवी के बारे में ग्राहकों से कैसे पूछें कि कैसे और कहां अपने क्षेत्र में एसटीआई या आईपीवी के लिए विशेषज्ञ सेवाओं के लिए ग्राहकों को संदर्भित करें, इस बारे में सोचें कि आप अपने अभ्यास में क्या सीखा है और सबमिट कर सकते हैं।
